reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting China's development of more effective legislation, regulation and enforcement, to enhance its business environment

description.narrative: This project is designed to improve China's institutional capacity in rule of law to tackle major economic and business issues that currently inhibits the business environment for international business. The project intends to promote key UK-China judicial and legal relationships, support China's enhancement of legislation and regulations, and address enforcement issues identified by international business in China. The project will also create a platform for the Rule of Law pillar of a China prosperity programme which will support progress towards a stronger rule of law including clearer judicial processes, dispute resolution and protection of intellectual property
